thread.title: Yes, There Is Migrant Chaos in Sweden ...
thread.title_full: Yes, There Is Migrant Chaos in Sweden ...

author: robinson
title: Yes, There Is Migrant Chaos in Sweden ...
text:
Yes, There Is Migrant Chaos in Sweden ...   Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
By Justin Holcomb, Townhall 
President Donald Trump was unfortunately proved right once again on Tuesday after an outbreak of violence and anger broke out overnight in the predominantly migrant town of Stockholm in Sweden. 
Swedish police are investigating a riot that erupted in a housing development after officers arrested a suspect on drug charges. 
Masked men set cars ablaze, looted local small businesses, and threw rocks at cops, injuring one police officer, Swedish officials said. 
One police officer was even forced to open fire on during the chaos. 
"This kind of situation doesn't happen that often but it is always regrettable when it happens," a police spokesman said.
